thread.title: 4-Star Safety P.J. Blue Talks Open Recruitment After Spurrier Resignation
thread.title_full: 4-Star Safety P.J. Blue Talks Open Recruitment After Spurrier Resignation

title: 4-Star Safety P.J. Blue Talks Open Recruitment After Spurrier Resignation
text:
4-Star Safety P.J. Blue Talks Open Recruitment After Spurrier Resignation Tools By Alabama News Network 
Story Created: Oct 14, 2015 at 11:06 PM CDT 
MONTGOMERY, AL --- After South Carolina coach Steve Spurrier announced he was resigning, 4-star safety and Gamecock commit P.J. Blue tweeted he is considering other schools. 
Watch the one-on-one interview above to hear what led to him to decommit plus the schools he is most interested in now.
